title: Fantasy football rankings for Week 7: Dalvin Cook gears up for Detroit Lions
text:
CLOSE Charles Curtis gives you four fantasy things to know for Week 7. USA TODAY

Fantasy football rankings for Week 7 are based on the point-per-reception (PPR) scoring used in most seasonal and daily fantasy football formats. One point is awarded for every 10 rushing and receiving yards and one point for every 20 passing yards. Six points are awarded for touchdowns scored, four points for passing TDs and one point for receptions.

On bye: Carolina, Cleveland, Pittsburgh, Tampa Bay

Rankings are compiled by FantasySharks.com.

(*- Be sure to check injury/status before kickoff)

description: Minnesota Vikings workhorse Dalvin Cook holds the No. 1 spot in this week's running back rankings; top QB Russell Wilson takes aim at Ravens.
